name: Claudia Torres
coverLetter:
Dear Sir/Maâ€™am,
I am writing to apply for the announced vacancy of the Cannabis Trimmer position, as posted on Craigslist. I was quite excited to see that your requirements closely match with my skills, talents and abilities. Using my strong organizational skills and sound judgment abilities, I can make a key contribution to your organization. I have recently relocated to Los Angeles from NYC for personal reasons.
I have an extensive hospitality and admin background. I've worked in hotels, restaurants, IT consulting, environmental tour guide to administrative assistant positions of all different companies. All those different experiences have allowed me grow and learn more than I could have ever imagined. I am able to help run a business successfully by using all the invaluable tools I have picked up along the way. I've learned to be creative, efficient, work as a team player and have strong communication skills. I am also articulate, self-motivated individual who can learn and adapt quickly to all challenges. Being a Jack-of-all-trades does have its benefits.
I have enclosed a resume for your review that will furnish you with information relative to my background. I look forward to the opportunity to speak with you and thank you in advance for your consideration.
Sincerely,
Claudia Torres
contact: Please contact me via email at cpt124@gmail.com
